title: simple sans-serif font ... a nice one
content:
Hi,  
i really like that font used at [wiredgamescafe.co.uk](http://web.archive.org/www.wiredgamescafe.co.uk) It is used in titles and in navigation. I thougt of Neo Sans but I’m not sure... Can someone help?

Thanks a lot :)

M.

 [‹ TV Series "Profiler" credits](http://web.archive.org/web/20081008043009/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43701 "Go to previous forum topic") [More rounded then Unit ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081008043009/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43675 "Go to next forum topic")
author: madeo

comments.content:
Close enough. I think it’s [Neo Tech](http://web.archive.org/web/20081008043009/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/creative_alliance/neo_tech_rg_alt)

-  
Arun  
-

By the way, you seem to have linked to the wrong page.
